Package com.atakmap.android.bloodhound.link

Class BloodHoundLinkReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.BroadcastReceiver
      • com.atakmap.android.bloodhound.link.BloodHoundLinkReceiver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MapMenuEventListener
    public class BloodHoundLinkReceiver
extends android.content.BroadcastReceiver
implements MapMenuEventListener
    Receiver for bloodhound link intents NOTE: This class is unrelated to the bloodhound tool - this receiver handles intents for the R&B bloodhound radial option Consider merging functionality at some point
